label: Data Receive (temp)
info:
DROP TABLE t_ladle_capture;
CREATE TABLE t_ladle_capture
(
	IDX		SMALLINT		   NOT NULL	   AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    `time`   DATETIME       NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    `sender`	 INT			   NOT NULL		COMMENT 'sender',
    `uuid`   VARCHAR(32)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'uuid'DEFAULT '0', 
    `temp`  float unsigned zerofill          NOT NULL    COMMENT 't0' DEFAULT '000000000000', 
    `fileName`  VARCHAR(64)       NULL        COMMENT 'fileName', 
    `absPath`   VARCHAR(512)      NULL        COMMENT 'absPath'
);
SELECT * FROM t_ladle_capture;
DROP TABLE t_kr_capture;
CREATE TABLE t_kr_capture
(
	IDX			SMALLINT		   	 NOT NULL 	 AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    `time`      DATETIME          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `sno`       VARCHAR(6)        NULL        COMMENT 'sno' DEFAULT 'CAM01', 
    `uuid`      VARCHAR(32)       NULL        COMMENT 'uuid', 
    `distance`  float unsigned    NULL        COMMENT 'distance', 
    `fileName`  VARCHAR(64)       NULL        COMMENT 'fileName', 
    `absPath`   VARCHAR(512)      NULL        COMMENT 'absPath'
);
SELECT * FROM t_kr_capture;
DROP TABLE t_slab_detail;
CREATE TABLE t_slab_detail
(
	IDX			SMALLINT		   	 NOT NULL 	 AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    `time`        DATETIME                   NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `TcNo`        VARCHAR(4)                 NOT NULL        COMMENT 'TcNo', 
    `pltNo`       VARCHAR(10)                NOT NULL        COMMENT 'pltNo', 
    `stClsFlag`   VARCHAR(2)                 NOT NULL        COMMENT 'stClsFlag', 
    `slabThick`   float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabThick', 
    `slabWidth`   float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabWidth', 
    `slabLength`  float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabLength', 
    `slabWeight`  float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabWeight', 
    `rollSchema`  INT                        NOT NULL        COMMENT 'rollSchema', 
    `cheCa`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheCa', 
    `cheNb`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheNb', 
    `cheV`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheV', 
    `cheTi`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheTi', 
    `cheMo`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheMo', 
    `cheSi`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheSi', 
    `cheNi`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheNi', 
    `cheCr`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheCr', 
    `cheS`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheS', 
    `cheP`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheP', 
    `cheMn`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheMn', 
    `cheC`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheC'
);

CREATE TABLE t_rolling_detail
(
	IDX			SMALLINT		   	 NOT NULL 	 AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    `time`           DATETIME       NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time', 
    `TcNo`           VARCHAR(4)     NOT NULL    COMMENT 'TcNo', 
    `pltNo`          VARCHAR(10)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'pltNo', 
    `slabAngle`      FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'slabAngle', 
    `rollPos_01`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_01', 
    `rollPos_02`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_02', 
    `rollPos_03`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_03', 
    `rollPos_04`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_04', 
    `rollPos_05`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_05', 
    `rollPos_06`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_06', 
    `rollPos_07`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_07', 
    `rollPos_08`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_08', 
    `rollPos_09`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_09', 
    `rollPos_10`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_10', 
    `rollPos_11`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_11', 
    `rollPos_12`     TINYINT        NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPos_12', 
    `rollPosAvg_01`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_01', 
    `rollPosAvg_02`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_02', 
    `rollPosAvg_03`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_03', 
    `rollPosAvg_04`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_04', 
    `rollPosAvg_05`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_05', 
    `rollPosAvg_06`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_06', 
    `rollPosAvg_07`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_07', 
    `rollPosAvg_08`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_08', 
    `rollPosAvg_09`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_09', 
    `rollPosAvg_10`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_10', 
    `rollPosAvg_11`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_11', 
    `rollPosAvg_12`  FLOAT          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'rollPosAvg_12'
);

select * from t_slab_detail;
DROP TABLE t_data_receive_log;
CREATE TABLE t_data_receive_log
(
    `ID`				INT UNSIGNED            NOT NULL    AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'index', 
    `time`         	DATETIME         NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `ip`          	VARCHAR(16)      NOT NULL    COMMENT 'ip', 
    `port`         	INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'port', 
    `dataLength`  	INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'data_length', 
    `dataDetail` 	VARCHAR(1000)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'data_detail', 
    PRIMARY KEY (ID)
);
select * from t_data_receive_log;

DROP TABLE t_data_send_log;
CREATE TABLE t_data_send_log
(
    `ID`          INT UNSIGNED     NOT NULL    AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID', 
    `time`        DATETIME         NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `ip`          VARCHAR(16)      NOT NULL    COMMENT 'ip', 
    `port`        INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'port', 
    `dataLength`  INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'dataLength', 
    `dataDetail`  VARCHAR(2000)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'dataDetail', 
    PRIMARY KEY (ID)
);

SELECT COUNT(dataLength) from t_data_receive_log;
SELECT COUNT(dataLength) from t_data_send_log;
select * from t_data_send_log;
select * from t_slab_detail order by time desc limit 1;

label: Data Receive (org)
info:
CREATE TABLE t_ladle_capture
(
	IDX		SMALLINT		   NOT NULL	   AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    `time`   DATETIME       NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    `sender`	 INT			   NOT NULL		COMMENT 'sender',
    `uuid`   VARCHAR(32)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'uuid'DEFAULT '0', 
    `temp`  float unsigned zerofill          NOT NULL    COMMENT 't0' DEFAULT '000000000000', 
    `fileName`  VARCHAR(64)       NULL        COMMENT 'fileName', 
    `absPath`   VARCHAR(512)      NULL        COMMENT 'absPath'
);

CREATE TABLE t_kr_capture
(
	IDX			SMALLINT		   	 NOT NULL 	 AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    `time`      DATETIME          NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `sno`       VARCHAR(6)        NULL        COMMENT 'sno' DEFAULT 'CAM01', 
    `uuid`      VARCHAR(32)       NULL        COMMENT 'uuid', 
    `distance`  float unsigned    NULL        COMMENT 'distance', 
    `fileName`  VARCHAR(64)       NULL        COMMENT 'fileName', 
    `absPath`   VARCHAR(512)      NULL        COMMENT 'absPath'
);

CREATE TABLE t_slab_detail
(
    `time`        DATETIME                   NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `TcNo`        VARCHAR(4)                 NOT NULL        COMMENT 'TcNo', 
    `pltNo`       VARCHAR(10)                NOT NULL        COMMENT 'pltNo', 
    `stClsFlag`   VARCHAR(2)                 NOT NULL        COMMENT 'stClsFlag', 
    `slabThick`   float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabThick', 
    `slabWidth`   float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabWidth', 
    `slabLength`  float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabLength', 
    `slabWeight`  float unsigned zerofill    NOT NULL        COMMENT 'slabWeight', 
    `rollSchema`  INT                        NOT NULL        COMMENT 'rollSchema', 
    `cheCa`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheCa', 
    `cheNb`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheNb', 
    `cheV`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheV', 
    `cheTi`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheTi', 
    `cheMo`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheMo', 
    `cheSi`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheSi', 
    `cheNi`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheNi', 
    `cheCr`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheCr', 
    `cheS`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheS', 
    `cheP`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheP', 
    `cheMn`       float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheMn', 
    `cheC`        float unsigned zerofill    NULL    COMMENT 'cheC', 
    PRIMARY KEY (time, TcNo)
);

CREATE TABLE t_data_receive_log
(
    `ID`				INT UNSIGNED            NOT NULL    AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'index', 
    `time`         	DATETIME         NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `ip`          	VARCHAR(16)      NOT NULL    COMMENT 'ip', 
    `port`         	INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'port', 
    `dataLength`  	INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'data_length', 
    `dataDetail` 	VARCHAR(1000)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'data_detail', 
    PRIMARY KEY (ID)
);
select * from t_data_receive_log;

CREATE TABLE t_data_send_log
(
    `ID`          INT UNSIGNED     NOT NULL    AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID', 
    `time`        DATETIME         NOT NULL    COMMENT 'time' DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    `ip`          VARCHAR(16)      NOT NULL    COMMENT 'ip', 
    `port`        INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'port', 
    `dataLength`  INT              NOT NULL    COMMENT 'dataLength', 
    `dataDetail`  VARCHAR(2000)    NOT NULL    COMMENT 'dataDetail', 
    PRIMARY KEY (ID)
);
